definition[0]: a pattern or picture made by fitting together small pieces of coloured stone, glass etc
example[0]: rooms decorated with wall paintings and mosaics
definition[1]: a group of different things that exist next to each other or together
example[2]: The forest floor was a mosaic of autumn colours.
example[3]: the complex mosaic of world cultures
definition[2]: relating to Moses, the great leader of the Jewish people in ancient times
